overview: Moussa, who had been on a long journey across the desert, suddenly returns to the village one day, and the creditors who loaned him travel money come with dissatisfaction. When a young, beautiful but poor Awa announces that she will marry her wealthy Kareem, her lover Karim decides to take revenge on her birthday. Memories of her unforgettable past come back to a woman, along with her longing for her lost son.
title: A day so long: Jeonju Digital Project 2008
